data: In a vast room hung with strangely figured arras and carpeted with Boukhara rugs of impressive age and workmanship, four men were sitting around a document-strown table.
Through the gates of the silver key
Lovecraft, H. P. (Howard Phillips), 1890-1937; Price, E. Hoffmann, 1898-1988
